text: Kamaghɨn e fo, arazir ghurir kam, gavgaviba puvatɨgha egha a deragha en akurvazir puvatɨ. Egha a bizitam gamima a derazir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, God anegɨfa. Egha God datɨrɨghɨn tuavir bar aghuir mam kui. Tuavir kamra kara, e bizir aghuir e fogha iniamiba bagha mɨzuai. Ezɨ tuavir kam Moses Osirizir Arazibagh afira. E tuavir kamɨn mangɨ Godɨn boroghɨra mangam.
